title: Ferrari's New 488 GTB: The 458 Successor is Boosted - AFTER/DRIVE
description: Ferrari has released the successor to the 458, the new 488 GTB.  This time however, somebody slapped a few hair dryers on the sides and called it a day.  So what does this mean for the Ferrari lineup?  Is this what the future holds to further extend the performance of tomorrow's supercars?  It this already too old of technology?  Is this the end of the naturally aspirated V8 for Ferrari?  Will Spinelli be chased by some cops midway through the show?  Find out today on AFTER/DRIVE.
